html:
1.31.19  1:18 am   do u ever have an existential crisis about the arbitrary innate features of the universe?

     like, why there are 3 spatial dimensions, 3 distinct states of matter, 26 sporadic simple groups, 3.14... diameters in a circumference, 12 fundamental fermions, 5 platonic solids...

it's all just numbers. there's no reason why they are what they are instead of some other number. we'll never find any meaning behind them, no matter how many fundamental facts we discover about the universe, the meaning will never be there.

html:
1.30.19  7:41 pm   1.29.19  9:16 am when do you think you might do the next round of reality edits,

      if that's something that fits the schedule rn?


embedded answer: https://billwurtz.com/questions/q.php?date=201901290916

1.29.19  9:16 am   1.27.19  8:04 pm   what is your set up for this? how can i do that

     you can do it with your phone, but i use a smaller device called a 'digital voice recorder.' i can't say what brand it is but i've been using the same one since 2010 (and before that i was using a similar one.) if you search for digital voice recorders i think you will find the kind of device i am talking about. i've discovered the best thing is to put it in the small pocket on the sun visor. then i discovered that this actually vibrates sometimes, (unfortunately most recordings i have from 2015 have a lot of vibrations in them) but after doing the journal edits project (making the reality page) in 2016 i discovered that i could use a glove to cushion the recorder, and also place a folded sock between the visor and the ceiling. this fixed the problem. that was in my previous car, and my current car, the pocket was actually too tight to hold the voice recorder but after stretching it out a bit now it fits. and i don't think there are any vibration problems but who knows, maybe there are, and i will discover it when i do the next round of reality edits
original_html:
1.30.19  7:41 pm   1.29.19  9:16 am when do you think you might do the next round of reality edits,

      if that's something that fits the schedule rn?
